text: "Country Ain't Country" is a song recorded by American country music artist Travis Tritt. It was released in January 2003 as the second single from the album Strong Enough. The song reached #26 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Teresa Boaz, Casey Beathard and Carson Chamberlain. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (2003) !align="center"|Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:2003 singles Category:2002 songs Category:Travis Tritt songs Category:Songs written by Casey Beathard Category:Songs written by Carson Chamberlain Category:Song recordings produced by Billy Joe Walker Jr. Category:Columbia Nashville Records singles
title: Country Ain't Country
